pros: A community focused on student success and mission driven. Project work is fun and collaborative.
cons: Staffing shortages makes everyone do more—and they do our of dedication and service.

review_title: Not bad, but not good either
pros:
-It's definitely a relaxed environment in most of the offices.
-Most people are knowledgeable about their office functions.
-It's a very safe environment.
-It's very speedy, even during peak times, but at the same time, students get as much help as they need.
cons:
Some departments treat their student workers like dirt. Granted, the students can't do everything a normal worker would do in some of the offices (due to confidentiality issues and such), but most of them are capable.
Inter-office communication is almost nil. Admissions, student development, registrar's, and the business offices need to get their stuff together in this regard; while they're aware of their own office functions, they have no idea what the other offices do, which sometimes leads to phone calls being an inter-office hot potato when an issue could potentially be handled by more than one office. Since these offices are really all interconnected and need to work together, this is an issue.

review_title: No possibility of getting hired full time
pros: The students are great to work with
cons: No possibility of getting hired full time due to a hiring freeze that has gone on for 2 years. The Fulton campus has very little support from directors of each department because they are only in that campus once a week if you're lucky. Because of this, they do not see the day to day activities.

pros: I worked at the Fulton campus (next to tractor store)
cons: little hectic as far as organization of rooms, but they were going through construction/renovation.

pros: Easy work study job. Have ample time to work on homework when not doing cleaning/supervising duties
Really enjoyed working with everyone at CCC.
cons: Budgets were always extremely tight and ended up being the reason for me leaving.

job_title: Computer Lab Assistant in Auburn, NY
cons: Minimum wage was the only rate offered.

pros: Great reliable and friendly IT team.
cons: Upper management can be a bit unclear
